snippet.title: Choppa: Rescue Rivals Steam Next Fest 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
New and improved Steam Next Fest 2022 trailer for the upcoming game 🚁 CHOPPA: RESCUE RIVALS 🚁 

WISHLIST ON STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1173100/Choppa_Rescue_Rivals/
JOIN OUR DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/DxDKWvYMSY
FOLLOW US ON TWITTER:
https://www.twitter.com/PartaGames

Globetrotting story mode with co-op and a motley crew of pilots!
Online and Local multiplayer!

Choppa: Rescue Rivals is a chaotic arcade-style helicopter rescue'em'up for one to four players. Take off with your trusty rescue chopper and carry disaster victims to safety before your rivals do! All bets are off in this high-flying, physics-driven game spanning multiple levels from snowy mountains to an offshore oil tanker disaster.
